[[2002–03 Mersin İdmanyurdu season|2002–03]] |} '''Mersin İdmanyurdu''' (also ''Mersin İdman Yurdu'', ''Mersin İY'', or ''MİY'') Sports Club; located in [[Mersin]], east [[Mediterranean Region, Turkey|Mediterranean]] coast of [[Turkey]] in 2001–02. [[Mersin İdmanyurdu SK|Mersin İdmanyurdu]] S.K. has finished [[TFF Second League]] Promotion Group at second place in 2001–02 season and promoted to [[2002–03 TFF First League]]. ==2001–02 league participation== ===Ranking Group=== Mersin İY's league performance in [[TFF Second League]] Ranking Group 1 in [[TFF Second League 2001–02|2001–02]] season is shown in the following table.Standings and results from [http://www.tff.org.tr/Default.aspx?pageID=800&grupID=82#grp TFF Archive] First team is MİY for both home and away matches. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !rowspan=2|place !rowspan=2|team !colspan=4|games !colspan=2|goals !rowspan=2|points !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|home !rowspan=2| !colspan=3|away |- !
